Interface CommentedConfigurationNodeIntermediary<N extends CommentedConfigurationNodeIntermediary<N>>

All Superinterfaces:

All Known Subinterfaces:

public interface CommentedConfigurationNodeIntermediary<N extends CommentedConfigurationNodeIntermediary<N>>
extends ScopedConfigurationNode<N>

  • Method Details

    • getComment

      @NonNull Optional<String> getComment()
      Gets the current value for the comment.

      If the comment contains multiple lines, the lines will be split by \n

      Returns:
      The configuration's current comment

    • setComment

      @NonNull N setComment​(@Nullable String comment)
      Sets the comment for this configuration node.
      Parameters:
      comment - The comment to set. Line breaks should be represented as LFs (\n)
      Returns:
      this

    • setCommentIfAbsent

      @NonNull N setCommentIfAbsent​(String comment)
      Set a comment on this node if it does not presently have a comment. The provided comment must not be null, because setting a null comment would be a no-op
      Parameters:
      comment - The comment to set. Line breaks should be represented as LFs (\n)
      Returns:
      this
